text: 1.21 Mat 11.25, Luk 10.21, Lom 1.20-21, 1.28 God ne ke gos nɨgtep gup tek, ne nɨgup, binɨb lum awl gos chɨn ke okok nɨgɨnɨgun agɨl ke nep pɨyow nepal okok, ne bɨ tay tek agɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgel tek lup. Anɨb ak tek ne ke gɨnɨg nɨg lak tek, binɨb kɨli takaw ne agñɨbun ak nɨŋɨd, anɨb apal, Takaw sawl sek apal. Pen takaw anɨb ak agñon, binɨb okok kɨli nɨŋɨd nop gos lɨnɨgel, kɨlop tɨk asɨk dup.
